unnormalised: ## Chai and Celebs: Your Dose of Bollywood Buzz!
normalised: ## Chai and Celebs: Your Dose of Bollywood Buzz!

unnormalised: Namaste, folks! Grab your chai and samosas because we're diving headfirst into the spicy world of Bollywood gossip! You know we love to keep you updated on all the *masala* happenings.
normalised: Namaste, folks! Grab your chai and samosas because we're diving headfirst into the spicy world of Bollywood gossip! You know we love to keep you updated on all the *masala* happenings.

unnormalised: First up, word on the street (and on Twitter, obviously) is that Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt were spotted house hunting in Bandra. Could baby Raha be getting a bigger *ghar* soon? Sources close to the couple say they are looking for a place with a huge garden - perfect for those adorable kiddo pics! Fans are going crazy!
normalised: First up, word on the street (and on Twitter, obviously) is that Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt were spotted house hunting in Bandra. Could baby Raha be getting a bigger *ghar* soon? Sources close to the couple say they are looking for a place with a huge garden - perfect for those adorable kiddo pics! Fans are going crazy!

unnormalised: Then, there's the whole Kartik Aaryan and Sara Ali Khan saga. Are they *just* friends? Spotted at the airport together heading to Jaipur for a wedding. Come on, guys, spill the beans! This on-again, off-again romance is more complicated than my auntie's *dhaal* recipe!
normalised: Then, there's the whole Kartik Aaryan and Sara Ali Khan saga. Are they *just* friends? Spotted at the airport together heading to Jaipur for a wedding. Come on, guys, spill the beans! This on-again, off-again romance is more complicated than my auntie's *dhaal* recipe!

unnormalised: Speaking of food, rumours are swirling about Deepika Padukone being pregnant. Apparently, she's been craving *biryani* like crazy, especially her mom’s recipe. Is this the ultimate clue or just a pregnancy craving? We’ll find out soon! 9 months max!
normalised: Speaking of food, rumours are swirling about Deepika Padukone being pregnant. Apparently, she's been craving *biryani* like crazy, especially her mom’s recipe. Is this the ultimate clue or just a pregnancy craving? We’ll find out soon! nine months maximum!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Priyanka Chopra Jonas shut down a troll who questioned her daughter Malti's name choice. Apparently, some people are just never happy. PC clapped back with a sassy reply, proving she’s still the desi girl we know and love.
normalised: Meanwhile, Priyanka Chopra Jonas shut down a troll who questioned her daughter Malti's name choice. Apparently, some people are just never happy. P C clapped back with a sassy reply, proving she’s still the desi girl we know and love.

unnormalised: And last but not least, prepping for Onam, Malayalam superstar Dulquer Salmaan was seen stocking up on groceries at a local market in Kochi. He even helped an old lady carry her bags! What a sweetheart. He seems just like us regular folk!

unnormalised: That's all for now folks! Keep refreshing for more celebrity gossip! Until next time, stay tuned and stay spicy! Don't forget to share this with all your Bollywood obsessed friends!
